recipe.title: Miso Soup with Vegetables and Tofu
ingredients: 2 1/2 tablespoons red miso (or more to taste)
1/2 pound firm tofu, cut into cubes
1 cup pea shoots, sunflower sprouts or radish sprouts
instructions: Blend miso with garlic, ginger, 1 cup cool water and 1 tablespoon vinegar in a food processor until smooth. Transfer miso broth to a bowl; stir in 2 cups cool water. Divide broth, tofu, snow peas, radishes and scallions among 4 bowls. Toss pea shoots with remaining 1/2 tablespoon vinegar and oil; garnish each bowl before serving.
